dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3871918K] Abuse and Harrassment of James Bartley

To Whom It May Concern:

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----

To: DMCA
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3871918K] Abuse and Harrassment of James Bartley

Multipart prefix (text/plain) 
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain) 
Hello, 
I am requesting...no insisting you delete any references to the term "splintering of
the splinters" as put without my consent in james Bartley's paper Milab Operations.
He is aware of my objections as he does not have my permission to use this as it ws
a part of my own experience. I am currently employing a lawyer and will have him
contact every webpage this appears on if I have to. james can be reached at
vixberg@msn.com . He is aware of the plagerism and exploitation of my own
experiences...and lacks the character to correct his errors. Please take this
statement down or i will have my attorney and the local FBI check into your
website....in the name of Homeland Security. 
 
Linda Pollaro 
Milab controllers don
